name: NWInterface
desc: An interface that a network connection uses to send and receive data.

items.name: let type: NWInterface.InterfaceType
items.desc: The type of the interface, such as Wi-Fi or loopback.

items.name: enum NWInterface.InterfaceType
items.desc: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.

items.name: let index: Int
items.desc: The system interface index associated with the interface.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: The description of the network interface.

items.name: static func != (NWInterface, NWInterface) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
